item.title: Little spoof of Kannukku Mai Azhagu lyrics
item.description: Today my sister was cleaning her contact lens in front of mirror. I suddenly remembered Tamil song Kannukku Mai Azhagu and lyrics and little poet in me whispered Kannukku Contact lens Azhagu. This induced me to spoof little bit of lyrics pertaining to current trend. I will spoof lyrics which I could. Kannukku **Contact lens** Azhagu, Kavithaikku Poi Azhagu Kannathil Kuzhi Azhagu, Kaar Koonthal **Kandalae** Azhagu Ilamaiku **photo** Azhagu, Muthumaikku Narai Azhagu Kalvarkku **phone number** Azhagu, Kaathalarkku **facebook** azhagu ** are spoofed ones.
